includedAssets.title: Season 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Season five of the smash-hit US sitcom sees Leonard's love life take yet another twist, while Howard prepares for married life and a trip into space. Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki and Kaley Cuoco star.
